description: Leo Foxx has to be one of the hottest straight lads ever to have the misfortune of finding himself subjected to the Boynapped crew! Toned, really cute and a cocky little fucker, Leo protests as the crew strap him down by the wrists and feet; screwed tight to the factory floor. Pulling at his chains, Leo has no idea that crew member Keiron Knight has plans to finger the straight lad's ass, hitting his virgin prostate for the first time ever! To make things a little more intense, Keiron then fingers Leo as he pours red hot wax over him.
title: Kieron Knight & Leo Foxx
